channel.title: UDP on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in UDP on My blog

item.title: Transferring files over CoAP
item.description: For constrained IoT applications, you want to limit the number of protocols and network stacks to implement.

item.title: CoAP and Lightweight M2M challenges with NAT gateways
item.description: With the rise of low power wide area (LPWA) networks, we see a rising interest in UDP-based protocols, but trading TCP for UDP has its own class of challenges.
